entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:07 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
